name: Ocean Survival 3 - Raft Escape
description:
New adventures in the ocean are waiting for you! Get ready to unravel all the secrets on tropical islands.

You continue your journey on a raft in the deep ocean. Left alone with the wildlife you have to survive on the island. Rely on yourself. You must escape from islands.

Collect resources all over the map. The world is completely open to exploration! Solve the mysteries of the islands!

Collect food and cook meals on the fire. To survive the night you need to build a hut and bonfire on a raft. Build yourself a house that you want!

A workbench will help you create new items and tools. Place it next to you on a raft and use accumulated resources, such as wood, stone, boards.

Explore the underwater world! Treasure chests are hidden there. But beware of sharks.

Start exploring the ocean now!
